components: SUSPENSION,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,POWER TRAIN,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: ACCELERATOR STICKS DUE TO CARBON BUILDUP ON THROTTLE BODY.  GASOLINE PREMATURELY BURNS BEFORE REACHING THE CYLINDER.  BALL JOINTS HAD TO BE REPLACED.  ENGINE OIL LEAKS.  COOLANT LEAKS.  TRANSMISSION LEAKS.   *TT  *NLM
